Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 256MB RAM (512 recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), Mouse, Keyboard.: Under Windows XP, the game requires graphic card drivers version 285.58 or older.

Macbook (early 2009), Macbook Pro (mid 2007), iMac (early 2010), MacMini (early 2009), Mac Pro (early 2009), MacBook Air (late 2008).
